Name: Fragment of a stela
Description: Fragment of a round-topped stela, showing the upper part of the right-hand corner. The scene shows eight priests who are carrying a sacred bark on their shoulders in a ceremonial procession. The bark is carried on long poles, the ram's head on the prow clearly visible, crowned with an uraeus. A large fan is on top of the boat, to shade the image of the god. On the right is another priest facing the bark and holding up a bunch of lotus flowers.
